com.varmateo.yawg.asciidoctor - package com.varmateo.yawg.asciidoctor
Classes implementing an ItemBaker based on the AsciidoctorJ library.
com.varmateo.yawg.breadcrumbs - package com.varmateo.yawg.breadcrumbs
Classes implementing the extension for adding breadcrumb data to the template data model.
com.varmateo.yawg.core - package com.varmateo.yawg.core
Implementation of the Yawg engine.
com.varmateo.yawg.freemarker - package com.varmateo.yawg.freemarker
Classes implementing a PageTemplateService based on the Freemarker library.
com.varmateo.yawg.html - package com.varmateo.yawg.html
Classes implementing a baker for HTML source files.
com.varmateo.yawg.logging - package com.varmateo.yawg.logging
Utility classes for logging.
com.varmateo.yawg.util - package com.varmateo.yawg.util
General utility classes.
copy(Path, Path) - Static method in class com.varmateo.yawg.util.FileUtils
Copies one file to a given location.
CoreSiteBakerFactory - Class in com.varmateo.yawg.core
Factory for SiteBaker objects.

create(Logger) - Static method in class com.varmateo.yawg.logging.LogFactory
Creates a Log that will use as output the given Logger instance.
createFor(Object) - Static method in class com.varmateo.yawg.logging.LogFactory
Creates a Log assigning it as subsystem name the class name of the given object.
